description:
Automatic Windows HDR Switching For Any Application.

PyAutoActions automates HDR management for your games and applications, enabling and disabling HDR based on the process status.
Changes:
- Fixed issue of command line arguments not passing correctly.
- Added support for multiple command line arguments separated by a space ex: (arg1 arg2 arg3)
